phrs.translation: 弓形, 半月形物, 二角形, 月牙形
月亮, 下弦月, 月光女神, 月亮女神
月光, 月光曲, 来自神月, 克莱尔月光曲
翻车鲀, 播放翻车鲀

sentences.sentence: The most famous opuses"Clair de Lune"(1887) was classified as prerequisite of enrollment in the Royal College of Music, London.
sentences.translation: 最著名的歌曲《月光》（1887）被列为伦敦皇家音乐学院入学的必唱曲目。

sentences.sentence: I know by my art that you will find King Lune straight ahead.
sentences.translation: 我凭我的法术推算得出你笔直往前走去，就会找到伦恩国王。

sentences.sentence: "Apparently King Lune is my father," said Shasta. "I might really have guessed it."
sentences.translation: “国王伦恩显然是我的父亲，”沙斯塔说道，“我确实应该猜得到的。”
